name: HockeyApp
description: Deploy your alpha and beta builds of mobile apps to HockeyApp
author: Jonathan Carter
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: apiToken
inputs.label: HockeyApp API token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The API token generated from HockeyApp to authenticate your account

inputs.name: appID
inputs.label: App ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the app youâ€™d like to upload a new build for. Leave empty to allow HockeyApp to infer the app ID automatically

inputs.name: binaryPath
inputs.label: Binary File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the apk or ipa file you want to publish

inputs.name: symbolsPath
inputs.label: Symbols File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the dSYM folder (iOS) or mappings.txt file (Android) file you want to publish

inputs.name: notesPath
inputs.label: Release Notes (File)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file where to get the release notes for this app version from. If the path is provided then 'Release notes' is ignored.

inputs.name: notes
inputs.label: Release Notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: What are the release notes for this app version

inputs.name: publish
inputs.label: Publish?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Is this app downloadable by users

inputs.name: mandatory
inputs.label: Mandatory?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Is this app mandatory by users

inputs.name: notify
inputs.label: Notify Users?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Would you like to notify your users that an update is available?

inputs.name: tags
inputs.label: Tag(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Restrict download to comma-separated list of tags

inputs.name: teams
inputs.label: Team(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Restrict download to comma-separated list of team IDs; example: 12,23,34

inputs.name: users
inputs.label: User(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Restrict download to comma-separated list of user IDs; example: 1234,5678
